blurb: Ashes of Creation is an open-world, non-faction based, no P2W, high-fantasy MMORPG.  Join us as we change the face of the  genre.
name: Ashes of Creation ~ New MMORPG by Intrepid Studios

rewards.reward: No Reward
rewards.description: No Reward

rewards.reward:
1 Month of game time
Your name formally recognized within the games' credits.
Access to in-game Chat Emoji pack - Tier 1
Additional character creation customization options - Tier 1
Unique "Explorer" forum badge
Unique in-game character title "Explorer"

rewards.reward:
Kickstarter Exclusive - Demonic / Angelic Character racial skin
Kickstarter Exclusive - Guildhall appearance
Kickstarter Exclusive - Receive Guild themed character cloaks and mount barding - 10 of each!
Name an NPC within Ashes of Creation*
Receive 5 Additional Closed Beta Keys - Phase 2  (6 Total)
Monster Token x 1 - Epic Tier
Receive an invitation to the Ashes of Creation Launch party!*
Unique "Leader of Men" forum badge
Unique in-game character title "Leader of Men"

Plus all previous rewards!!

rewards.title: Leader of Men

rewards.reward:
Have your Character Immortalized within Ashes of Creation - a personal statue will be placed in the persistent game world.
5 Additional Closed Beta Keys - Phase 1 (6 Total)
Gain Access to the "Phoenix Initiative"
Access to monthly Live Q&A sessions with the Devs
Work with the Devs to design an Event within Ashes of Creation!***
Receive an invitation to tour Intrepid Studios*
Unique "Royalty" forum badge
Unique in-game character title "Royal"
Official Intrepid Studios Dev Shirt, signed by the Team!**

Plus all previous rewards!!
rewards.description:
Have your Character Immortalized within Ashes of Creation - a personal statue will be placed in the persistent game world.

Receive an invitation to tour Intrepid Studios*
Unique "Royalty" forum badge
Unique in-game character title "Royal"
Official Intrepid Studios Dev Shirt, signed by the Team!**

Plus all previous rewards!!
rewards.title: Royalty

rewards.reward:
Receive the Phoenix's aura - Have your characters emblazoned with the aura of the phoenix effect!
Receive a Custom built Freehold Manor, hand designed by our artists!
Work with the Devs to design a monster for Ashes of Creation and receive a version of that monster as an exclusive pet!***
5 Additional Closed Beta Keys - Phase 2 (11 Total)
Unique "Hero of the People" forum badge
Unique in-game character title "Hero of the People"

Plus all previous rewards!!
rewards.description:
Receive the Phoenix's aura - Have your characters emblazoned with the aura of the phoenix effect!
Receive a Custom built Freehold Manor, hand designed by our artists!
Work with the Devs to design a monster for Ashes of Creation and receive a version of that monster as an exclusive pet!***
5 Additional Closed Beta Keys - Phase 2 (11 Total)
Unique "Hero of the People" forum badge
Unique in-game character title "Hero of the People"

Plus all previous rewards!!
rewards.title: Hero of the People

rewards.reward:
Work with the Devs to design one of the world's fortresses!***
5 Additional Closed Beta Keys - Phase 1 (11 Total)
Additional Invitation to Launch Party in Las Vegas, 2 nights of accommodations provided at Wynn Resort. (2 Tickets total)*
Invitation to Dinner with the Development Team. (During the launch party weekend in Las Vegas)*
Join a weekend long gaming session including a campaign of DnD/Pathfinder set in the Ashes of Creation world GM'ed by Steven Sharif! (During the launch party weekend in Las Vegas)*
Tickets to PAX West, Private VIP access to the Ashes of Creation booth*
Unique "Avatar of the Phoenix" forum badge
Unique in-game character title "Avatar of the Phoenix"

Plus all previous rewards!!
rewards.description:

Tickets to PAX West, Private VIP access to the Ashes of Creation booth*
Unique "Avatar of the Phoenix" forum badge
Unique in-game character title "Avatar of the Phoenix"

Plus all previous rewards!!
rewards.title: Avatar of the Phoenix
